trans-unit.target: （请替换您自己的GitHub用户名）：

trans-unit.source: Important Note: As with repository downloads, the url must use the
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：与资源库下载一样，该网址必须使用

trans-unit.source: Important Note: The url must use the
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：网址必须使用

trans-unit.source: API keys are tied to an individual user account.
trans-unit.target: API密钥是与个人用户账户绑定的。

trans-unit.source: Before you can access private repositories from this module, you must create and store an API key on each system running buildout. Unlike the v2 API where one key was issued per user, you may create as many keys as you like and revoke them at will.
trans-unit.target: 在您可以从这个模块访问私有仓库之前,您必须在每个运行buildout的系统上创建并存储一个API密钥。与v2 API不同的是,v2 API为每个用户发放一个密钥,您可以创建任意数量的密钥,并可以随意撤销它们。

trans-unit.source: Buildout extension to enable downloads from private GitHub repositories into buildout find-links and download recipes
trans-unit.target: Buildout扩展,可以从私人GitHub仓库下载到buildout查找链接和下载食谱中。

trans-unit.source: Buildout from GitHub
trans-unit.target: 来自GitHub的Buildout

trans-unit.source: Changes to githubbuildout
trans-unit.target: 对githubbuildout的修改

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: 学分

trans-unit.source: Declare a user agent to comply with GitHub’s new API requirement (see http://developer.github.com/changes/2013-04-24-user-agent-required/):
trans-unit.target: 声明用户代理以符合GitHub的新API要求（请参阅 http://developer.github.com/changes/2013-04-24-user-agent-required/）：

trans-unit.source: For details on managing authorization GitHub’s OAuth tokens, see the API documentation: http://developer.github.com/v3/oauth/#oauth-authorizations-api
trans-unit.target: 有关管理授权GitHub的OAuth令牌的详细信息，请参阅API文档：http : //developer.github.com/v3/oauth/#oauth-authorizations-api

trans-unit.source: GitHub Repository Downloads
trans-unit.target: GitHub版本库下载

trans-unit.source: GitHub Static Downloads (DEPRECATED)
trans-unit.target: GitHub静态下载 (已删除)

trans-unit.source: GitHub has become a commonly-used SCM tool for software engineering teams. The purpose of this Buildout extension is to enable the retrieval of source tarballs and static downloads from private repositories by using the API v3’s token-based authentication, combined with a bit of URL rewriting to retrieve files using the API server instead of the main website when required.
trans-unit.target: GitHub已成为软件工程团队常用的SCM工具。此Buildout扩展的目的是通过使用API​​ v3的基于令牌的身份验证结合一些URL重写以使用API​​服务器而不是主网站来检索文件，从而能够从私有存储库中检索源压缩文件和静态下载。需要。

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT NOTE: Support for static downloads has been deprecated by GitHub as of 2012-12-11 and will be removed “in 90 days” (on or around 2013-03-11). If your project depends on this feature, now would be a good time to make alternate plans. For details, see the link below:
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：自2012年12月11日起，GitHub已弃用对静态下载的支持，并且将在“ 90天内”（在2013-03-11左右）将其删除。如果您的项目依赖于此功能，那么现在将是制定替代计划的好时机。有关详细信息，请参见下面的链接：

trans-unit.source: If you plan to make multiple keys for distribution to different systems (e.g. automated build environment), you might want to include a description to be able to distinguish them from one another later:
trans-unit.target: 如果你计划制作多个密钥,以便分发到不同的系统(例如自动构建环境),你可能需要包含一个描述,以便以后能够将它们彼此区分开来。

trans-unit.source: Important Note: You MUST specify the scopes attribute to secure access to private repositories; leaving the scope blank provides read-only access to public data.
trans-unit.target: 重要注意:您必须指定作用域属性,以确保对私有存储库的访问;将作用域留空则可提供对公共数据的只读访问。

trans-unit.source: In practice, you would typically use this to retrieve a tarball for installation as an egg in your buildout file, using a recipe similar to this:
trans-unit.target: 在实践中,你通常会使用这个方法来检索一个 tar 包,以作为 buildout 文件中的一个蛋来安装,使用的配方与此类似。

trans-unit.source: Initial Release (based on lovely.buildouthttp)
trans-unit.target: 初始版本(基于lovely.buildouthttp)

trans-unit.source: Note: These URLs will be rewritten during retrieval to use the API v3 URL instead. If you wish, you can explicitly specify the API server URL for retriving the file:
trans-unit.target: 注意:在检索过程中,这些 URL 将被重写为使用 API v3 URL。如果你愿意,你可以明确地指定API服务器URL来重新检索文件。

trans-unit.source: Now configure the value of github.accesstoken to the hash returned from the command above:
trans-unit.target: 现在将github.accesstoken的值配置为上面命令返回的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Please see the sections below for setup and usage instructions.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置和使用说明,请参见以下部分。

trans-unit.source: Request an API Key
trans-unit.target: 申请API密钥

trans-unit.source: Since these files can contain static software releases as eggs or anything else you want (media files, configuration data, etc.) it is up to you how to use them in your buildout; a common pattern is to install them as a part in a fashion similar to the following example:
trans-unit.target: 由于这些文件可以包含静态软件发布的彩蛋或其他任何你想要的东西(媒体文件、配置数据等),这取决于你如何在你的构建中使用它们;一个常见的模式是以类似于下面例子的方式将它们作为一个部分来安装。

trans-unit.source: Static downloads that have been previously uploaded to your GitHub project may also be retrieved using the same URL you would use in your browser, formed as follows:
trans-unit.target: 之前已经上传到GitHub项目的静态下载,也可以使用与浏览器相同的URL进行检索,格式如下。

trans-unit.source: Store API Key in Git Config
trans-unit.target: 在Git配置中存储API密钥

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Bernd Dorn, Jürgen Kartnaller, Bernd Rössl and the rest at Lovely Systems for lovely.buildouthttp (upon which this project is based), and to Clayton Parker and Tarek Ziade for bugfixes and extensions.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了Bernd Dorn，JürgenKartnaller，BerndRössl和Lovely Systems的其他人为lovely.buildouthttp（该项目所基于的网站），以及Clayton Parker和Tarek Ziade的错误修复和扩展。

trans-unit.source: You can create API v3 key using
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用以下方法创建API v3密钥

trans-unit.source: You can instruct Buildout to download a tarball of any refid from your repository by specifying the same URL as you would use in your browser to retrieve it, using the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: 你可以指示Buildout从你的仓库中下载任何refid的tar包,通过指定与你在浏览器中使用的相同的URL来检索它,使用以下语法。

trans-unit.source: curl
trans-unit.target: 卷曲

trans-unit.source: githubbuildout/$version zc.buildout
trans-unit.target: githubbuildout/$version zc.buildout

trans-unit.target: http
